name: 李魁鵬
objective:
1	Applications of Refrigeration and Air Conditioning
2	Thermal Principles
3	Psychrometry and Wetted-Surface Heat Transfer
4	Heating- and Cooling-Load Calculations
5	Air-Conditioning Systems
6	Fan and Duct Systems
7	Pumps and Piping
8	Cooling and Dehumidifying Coils
9	Air Conditioning Controls
10	The Vapor Compression Cycle
12	Compressors
13	Condensers and Evaporators
14	Expansion Devices
15	Refrigerants
16	Multipressure Systems
17	Absorption Refrigeration
18	Heat Pumps
19	Cooling Towers and Evaporative Condensers
20	Air Duct Systems and Noise Reduction
21       Energy Saving Technologies

materials:
教材書名：
W. F. Stoecker and J. W. Jones, Refrigeration and Air Conditioning, 2nd Ed., McGraw-Hill, Inc., Singapore, 1982.
參考書籍：
1. Industrial Refrigeration Handbook, 1998, Wilbert F. Stoecker, McGraw-Hill, Inc.
2. Roy J. Dossat, Principles of Refrigeration, Prentice Hall, 1997.
3. Industrial Refrigeration: Principles, Design and Applications, 1992, P. C. Koelet, Marcel Dekker, Inc.
4. ASHRAE Handbook
5. 冷凍工程規劃管理, 何宗岳
